name: IndusNet Technologies
description: At INT. we believe in your ideas and leverage our extensive knowledge to bring them to life. Our consultative approach is analytics-driven. We harness the power of technology to ring innovative customer-centric solutions for your success. We are redefining the path of your growth with high-quality craftsmanship by leveraging disruptive technologies.
features: One house for the complete digital solution which lowers cost and enables total ownership of the project with superior quality and timely delivery.
Innovation and excellence are our core for every digital solution. We empower clients to outsmart the industry by challenging the status quo.
Since 1997, we have been offering new-age digital solutions to keep your business digitally advanced and sustainable to the uncertain challenges.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: We Deliver #DigitalSuccess
ShortDescription: INT. (Indus Net Technologies) is an award-winning full-stack software engineering solutions company with a pioneering legacy spanning 25 years, over 500 clients, and 11,000 plus client projects.

Highlights.name: Award-Winning Full-Stack Digital Service Transformation Company
Highlights.description: Indus Net Technologies is an award-winning company that provides a full range of digital service transformation services. This means they can help businesses with all aspects of their digital transformation journey, from strategy and planning to implementation and support.

Highlights.name: Simplifies Digital Transformation Journeys for Businesses
Highlights.description: Indus Net Technologies helps businesses simplify their digital transformation journeys by providing them with the tools and expertise they need to succeed. They can help businesses identify their digital transformation goals, develop a plan to achieve those goals, and implement that plan.

Highlights.name: Proven Track Record of Success
Highlights.description: Indus Net Technologies has a proven track record of success, with over 500 happy clients and 10 offices worldwide. This means that they have a lot of experience helping businesses transform their digital operations, and they have a good reputation for doing so.

enhanced_description: IndusNet Technologies (INT.) is an award-winning full-stack software engineering solutions company with over 25 years of pioneering legacy and experience, having completed more than 11,000 client projects for over 500 clients. They specialize in digital service transformation, leveraging disruptive technologies such as Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain to deliver innovative, customer-centric solutions. Their analytics-driven, consultative approach helps businesses achieve digital success and sustainability, enabling them to outsmart the industry by challenging the status quo. INT. offers a comprehensive 'one house' approach for complete digital solutions, aiming to lower costs and ensure total project ownership with superior quality and timely delivery, particularly focusing on HR functions like recruiting, talent management, and total rewards.
key_use_cases: Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Simplifying digital transformation journeys for businesses
Ensuring business digital advancement and sustainability
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive 'one house' solution for complete digital needs
Reduced costs through integrated service delivery
Superior quality and timely project delivery
Innovation-driven approach empowering clients to outsmart competitors
Extensive legacy and experience (25+ years in digital solutions)
Proven track record of success with a large client base (500+ clients)
